body_html:
I converted the rgbFrameBitmpp like this:
public Bitmap convertBmp(Bitmap bmp) {
int w = bmp.getWidth();
int h = bmp.getHeight();
Matrix matrix = new Matrix();
matrix.postScale(-1, 1); // 镜像水平翻转
Bitmap convertBmp = Bitmap.createBitmap(bmp, 0, 0, w, h, matrix, true);
return convertBmp;
}
rgbFrameBitmap = convertBmp(rgbFrameBitmap);
and then I got correct box.
however, when target moves, the box is still there, and new box which is correct shows, too. I am wondering why it happens @@
